values: 击；撞；打；罢工；突然想到；突然意识到；突击；袭击；进攻；（疾病、灾难等）侵袭；让（某人）觉得；引起（强烈感情）；达成；达到；行进；（时钟）敲响；发现；铸造；冲制；删除；踢球；击球；使处于（特定状态）；摆出（姿态）；照在…上；弹奏；奏出；划（火柴）； 击出（火星）；拆除（帐篷、帆等）；生根；附着；急拉钓线把鱼钩住
罢工；罢市；罢课；袭击；攻击；击；踢；（石油等宝贵资源的）发现；（投出的）好球；（棒球中的）击空；不利因素；拒绝；抗拒；（地层、断层等地质特征的）走向

synonym.mean: 打，打击；罢工；敲，敲击；抓；打动；穿透
打，击；罢工；撞击，冲击；侵袭；打动；到达

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 罢工，打，打击（strike的过去式和过去分词）
显著的，突出的，惊人的；打击的；罢工的
罢工者；打击者；[军] 撞针；钟锤；叉鱼的人

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，多指急速或突然一次猛击。
普通用词，含义广泛，指连续打击。游戏、竞赛或战争中作打败解。
普通用词，常与strike换用，侧重有目标的猛击，强调用力击中。
侧重指用棍子或鞭子等痛打。

word_group.brief_definition: 和某人建立友谊；开始来往
自谋生路；失败, 不成功

word_group.phrase: strike while the iron is hot

word_group.brief_definition: 打开成功(或财富)之门, 踏上通往成功(或财富)之路
突击部队；打击力量；前锋

bilingual.source: The strike has been called off by the workmen.

bilingual.target: 他们计划煽动一场罢工。

bilingual.source: The breakdown in negotiations led to a strike.
bilingual.target: 谈判的故障导致了罢工。
工人在罢工期间举着标语牌。

bilingual.source: Workers decided to strike for better wages.
bilingual.target: 工人们决定为更高的工资罢工。

bilingual.source: The workers are on strike for higher wages.
bilingual.target: 劳动者们在罢工以争取更高的工资。

bilingual.source: The inequal treatment of employees led to a strike.
bilingual.target: 员工的不平等待遇导致了罢工。

bilingual.source: There were rumblings of a possible strike among the workers.
bilingual.target: 工人中有可能罢工的传闻。

bilingual.source: Workers fought for their entitlements during the strike.
bilingual.target: 工人在罢工期间争取他们的权利。

bilingual.source: The workers went on strike because they were underpaid.
bilingual.target: 工人们罢工了，因为他们工资过低。

list.abstract: STRIKE（英[straɪk]，美[straɪk]），英语单词。为动词时指打、突然降临、侵袭等；为名词时指罢工、袭击、偷袭。短语搭配有strike up（开始演奏）。例句有“Strike his name from the list.（把他的名字从名单上勾掉。）” STRIKE的不及物动词类近义词有grasp；及物动词类近义词有impact；名词类近义词有stroke。反义词有miss。
强袭高达，动漫《机动战士高达seed》中的角色，作为一种作战兵器，本机是地球联合在中立国奥布所有的资源卫星赫利奥波利斯上极为机密开发的五架MS中的一架。 强袭高达可以对应战况的不同而换装3种不同的选装部件，最终成为中距离机动战型强袭高达、炮战型强袭高达和近距离格斗战剑装备型强袭高达。

yingyinNormal.en: Lucca's right. The debt strike is working. Colosseum stock is falling.
yingyinNormal.zh: 卢卡说得对，债务罢工生效了，克鲁斯曼的股价正在下跌。

yingyinNormal.en: A guy bombs a building, the rich go out on strike. It's a 12-year-old's view of the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个家伙炸毁大楼，富人实行罢工，这就是十二岁孩子眼中的世界。

yingyinNormal.en: Just to recap, you're now facing a debt strike which is destroying your not-very-good name, a shareholder suit which could bankrupt you in court.
yingyinNormal.zh: 总结一下，你们现在面临的债务罢工正在摧毁你们本就不怎么好的名声，而股东代表诉讼将在法庭上把你们告到破产。

yingyinNormal.en: And of course, there's been ups and downs along the way. Like the big Amoskeag strike in the 1920s over pay and hours. But this industry survived that as well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，这些年来一直有起起落落，就像20年代为薪酬和工时而举行的大埃默斯基格罢工，但这个行业也还是挺过来了。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Asher, the warrant... Strike that. Given that... Strike that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 亚瑟先生，搜查令，收回那句，考虑到，收回那句。

yingyinNormal.en: But you strike out, you resign. Okay. Deal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是找不到，你就得辞职。好吧，成交。

yingyinNormal.en: Strike two. Maybe, maybe try something other than sex.
yingyinNormal.zh: 两局连胜。也许你该试试性骚扰以外的借口。

yingyinNormal.en: Every rivet that they strike could have been a bullet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们敲击的每颗铆钉都有可能是子弹。

yingyinNormal.en: So the government is publicly admitting responsibility for the strike?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么政府是公开承认要为这次袭击负责了？

yingyinNormal.en: Do we have to strike a pose every time we land?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们需要每次出场都摆个造型吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Can we strike a deal? Whereby you are very un-chatty around me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们来个约定吧？在我身边时别那么健谈如何？

yingyinNormal.en: You know what? Strike that. My name actually is Joe. Joe, Hill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 更正，其实我叫乔乔希尔 。

yingyinNormal.en: And frankly, who can strike some people as being kind of a weirdo.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且老实说，这个人在别人眼里还是个奇葩。

yingyinNormal.en: So you could come back and strike fear into our hearts. But it won't work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让你们活着回来引发恐惧，我可不会着他的道

yingyinNormal.en: If you don't treat, you could lose significant yield. So Greg calls in an air strike.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你不处理就会遭受很大的损失。因此格雷格呼叫了空中打击。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not gonna strike out. You can lead a blonde to water, but you can't make her drink.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不会受打击的。你可以带美女到水池边，但你不能强迫她喝水。

yingyinNormal.en: So, the question is: who in S.H.I.E.L.D could launch a domestic missile strike? Pierce.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在的问题是局里谁有权发动国内导弹袭击。皮尔斯。

yingyinNormal.en: I agree with General Braegher. While a successful air strike against Ahmadi would play well…
yingyinNormal.zh: 我同意布雷格将军的看法。虽然对艾哈迈迪发动精确空袭会非常有利于…

yingyinNormal.en: Exactly. Every man for himself, gentlemen. And those who strike out are stuck with her friends.
yingyinNormal.zh: 完全正确。先生们，每一个都为自己。那些受打击的就和她的朋友在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: Mike, there was a drone strike, to get him. 2 years ago, authorized by the G8. So we took a shot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 麦克，两年前我们对他发动无人机空袭，八大工业国家组织批准了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 显著的；引人注目的；罢工的；非常漂亮的；非常好看的
adv. 醒目地；引人注目地；突出地；显著地
adj. 动不了的；固定的；卡住的；（想法）摆脱不了的；陷入困境的；难以改变的；难以摆脱的；（读书或回答问题等）卡壳的；难住的；答不上来的

word_family.mean: v. 打；击；突然降临；侵袭；使突然想起；使突然想到；罢工；取消；删除；勾销；铸造；冲制；压出；发现；移动；行进；拆除；撤；把（枝）插进土里生根；急拉钓线把鱼钩住

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 和某人建立友谊；开始来往

sense_info_list.en: stop work in protest about a grievance
sense_info_list.zh: 罢工; 罢课; 罢市

examination_example.sentence: However, over the past 12 months, those commuters have also experienced some of the worst rail <highlight>strikes</highlight> in years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，在过去的12个月里，这些通勤者也经历了一些近年来最严重的铁路罢工。

examination_example.sentence: The Government has pledged to change the law to introduce a minimum service requirement so that, even when <highlight>strikes</highlight> occur, services can continue to operate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 政府承诺修改法律，引入最低服务要求，这样即使罢工发生，服务也能继续运作。

examination_example.sentence: The responsibility for the latest wave of <highlight>strikes</highlight> rests on the unions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近这一波罢工的责任在于工会。

sense_info_list.en: come into the mind of someone suddenly or unexpectedly; give someone a particular impression
sense_info_list.zh: 给...印象; 让(某人)觉得

examination_example.sentence: Looking back, he is <highlight>struck</highlight> that his parents could provide a comfortable life for their children even though neither had completed college when he was young.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 回想起来，他很惊讶，他的父母能给他们的孩子提供舒适的生活，尽管他们都没有在他年轻的时候完成大学学业。

examination_example.sentence: Its Campaign to Protect Rural England <highlight>struck</highlight> terror into many local Conservative parties.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它发起的“保护英格兰乡村运动”令许多地方保守党感到恐慌。

examination_example.sentence: When one looks at the photographs of the gardens created by the homeless, it <highlight>strikes</highlight> one that, these gardens speak of various other fundamental urges.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当人们看到这些由无家可归者创造的花园的照片时，会突然想到，这些花园反映了各种其他的基本需求。

sense_info_list.zh: (strike a balance)平衡对立的双方

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Strike</highlight> a balance among different plants
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在不同的植物之间保持平衡

examination_example.sentence: Thankfully, there is a way out of this trap – but it involves <highlight>striking</highlight> a subtle balance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 值得庆幸的是，有一个办法可以摆脱这个陷阱——但它涉及到一种微妙的平衡。

sense_info_list.zh: 击打; 敲打; 撞击; 敲击

examination_example.sentence: Now utopia has grown unfashionable, as we have gained a deeper appreciation of threats facing us, from asteroid <highlight>strike</highlight> to epidemic flu and to climate change.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，乌托邦已经不再流行，因为我们对自己面临的威胁有了更深的认识，从小行星撞击到流行性感冒，再到气候变化。

sense_info_list.zh: (strike up with sb.)和某人建立友谊; 开始来往

examination_example.sentence: In one series of studies, researchers instructed Chicago-area commuters using public transportation to <highlight>strike</highlight> up a conversation with someone near them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一系列的研究中，研究人员指示芝加哥地区的通勤者使用公共交通工具，与身边的人交谈。

sense_info_list.en: occur suddenly and have harmful or damaging effects on
sense_info_list.zh: 爆发; 侵袭

sense_info_list.en: (of a thought or idea) come into the mind of someone suddenly or unexpectedly
sense_info_list.zh: 突然想到

sense_info_list.en: carry out an aggressive or violent action, typically without warning
sense_info_list.zh: 袭击; 进攻; 偷袭
取消; 删除; 废除

sense_info_list.en: move or proceed vigorously or purposefully
sense_info_list.zh: 移动; 行进
发现(黄金; 矿物; 石油等)

word_usage.usage:
表示“击打、撞击”
strike是较正式用词，指迅速或突然地用力一击或敲击，可以是有意的，也可以是无意的。
beat是普通用词，指用手或器械连续击打，也指在游戏、竞赛或战争中战胜对手。
hit是普通用词，指有目标地猛击，强调用力击中；引申指在精神、经济等方面予以打击。
knock指用拳头或器械猛敲、猛打，强调非常用力。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“击打”，泛指所有“打”的动作。
意为“打，击中”侧重“击中”的意思，有时可以指打一下。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: Screen Actors Guild-American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (SAG-AFTRA) has declared a <highlight>strike</highlight> against 11 video game publishers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国电影演员协会和广播电视艺术家联合会(SAG-AFTRA)宣布对11家电子游戏发行商进行罢工。

sense_info_list.zh: 击打; 敲打; 撞击; 敲击

examination_example.sentence: Last week, one operated by the taxi company Uber <highlight>struck</highlight> and killed a woman pushing her bicycle across a wide road in Arizona.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上周，Uber出租车公司运营的一辆出租车在亚利桑那州撞死了一名推着自行车穿过宽阔马路的妇女。

sense_info_list.zh: 袭击; 进攻; (尤指)空袭; 军事进攻

examination_example.sentence_trans: “直到他们决定罢工，我才真正关心我的思想和身体。”

examination_example.sentence_trans: 邮件公司是物流公司，这一点使他们在灾难发生的时候处在了一个特殊的地位。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 显著的；引人注目的；罢工的；非常漂亮的；非常好看的

word_family.mean: v. 打；击；突然降临；侵袭；使突然想起；使突然想到；罢工；取消；删除；勾销；铸造；冲制；压出；发现；移动；行进；拆除；撤；把（枝）插进土里生根；急拉钓线把鱼钩住

sense_info_list.en: (of a thought or idea) come into the mind of someone suddenly or unexpectedly
sense_info_list.zh: 突然想到

examination_example.sentence: His comment <highlight>struck</highlight> me as strange.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的评论使我感到奇怪。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>struck</highlight> me that playing against the other team was a great learning moment for all the girls on the team.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我猛然意识到，对队里所有的女孩来说，与另一支球队比赛都是一个很好的学习机会。

sense_info_list.zh: 击打; 敲击

examination_example.sentence: Just before September, Miller was <highlight>struck</highlight> by a car and lost his right arm.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就在9月的前几天，米勒被一辆车撞了，失去了右臂。

sense_info_list.zh: 达成(协议)

examination_example.sentence: Some labor unions <highlight>struck</highlight> a deal with a group of companies limiting the number of hours that independent contractors can be on call.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些工会与一些公司达成协议，限制独立承包商可以随时待命的时间。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 击打; 敲打; 撞击
罢工; 拒绝; 抗拒
踢/击球

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 击打; 敲打; 撞击

examination_example.sentence: The lightning strikes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 闪电来袭。

examination_example.sentence: It can use "machine learning" to predict when and where lightning (闪电) will <highlight>strike</highlight> (闪击).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以使用“机器学习”来预测闪电将在何时何地发生。

examination_example.sentence: According to the passage, the <highlight>strikes</highlight> can't cause earthquakes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据这篇文章，罢工不会引起地震。

sense_info_list.zh: 罢工; 拒绝; 抗拒

examination_example.sentence: It was a good place, she thought, for a mother to go on <highlight>strike</highlight> (罢工) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她想，这是一个母亲罢工的好地方。

examination_example.sentence: Susan’s <highlight>strike</highlight> got her kids’ attention, of course.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，苏珊的罢工引起了孩子们的注意。

examination_example.sentence: To get permission for college, she went on three-day- hunger <highlight>strike</highlight>(抗议).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了获得上大学的许可，她绝食抗议了三天。

sense_info_list.en: o hit or kick a ball, etc.
sense_info_list.zh: 踢/击球

examination_example.sentence: He can run, dribble (运球), pass and <highlight>strike</highlight> the ball as well as any of his able-bodied teammates.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他能跑、能运球、能传球、能击球，就像他身体健全的队友一样。
